long_description: The Ruffwear Palisades dog pack enables your dog to enjoy multiday backcountry adventures. It features removable saddlebags, collapsible water bottles and a load-compression system. Built on Ruffwear's Web Master dog harness chassis, this pack offers comfortable weight distribution and load stability. 5 points of adjustment provide a customizable fit and full range of motion; secure design helps prevent your hairy Houdini from wriggling out of the harness. Removable saddlebags make rest stops and water crossings easy; 2 collapsible water bottles offer 2 liters of total capacity. Compression system helps create a compact and comfortable load. The Ruffwear Palisades dog pack features easy-access top stash pockets, water-resistant coated zippers and reflective trim for visibility in low light.
short_description: The Ruffwear Palisades dog pack enables your dog to enjoy multiday backcountry adventures. It features removable saddlebags, collapsible water bottles and a load-compression system.
